parameter.name: maxtries
parameter.p: The object shown below is rotating about a fixed pivot point. The velocity (relative to the pivot) is shown at two different points on the object. Is this object a rigid body?

choicegroup.choice: Yes, this object is a rigid body.
No, this object is not a rigid body.
It is impossible to tell whether this is a rigid body.

hintgroup.p: In a rotating rigid object, the entire object rotates with the same angular velocity around its pivot point. The two points shown have different angular velocities about the pivot point.
